Fabric Simulation Lab

Left Click + Drag: Cut the cloth

Right Click + Drag: Wind / Push

Spacebar: Reset

Denim

Heavy, stiff, low mesh density.
High friction (stops swinging fast).

Linen

Balanced weight and flexibility.
Natural fiber behavior.

Silk

Light, airy, high mesh density.
Low friction (flutters continuously).

Ultra Silk

Ultra-light, ultra-fine mesh.
Extremely low friction (flows like liquid).
